common.title: Common Settings
common.invalidProxyUrl: Invalid proxy URL, please enter valid http/https URL
common.addCustomSearchEngineDesc: Add a new search engine by providing a name and search URL. The URL must include {query} as the query placeholder.
common.searchEngineUrlError: URL must include {'{'}query{'}'} as the query placeholder
common.deleteCustomSearchEngineDesc: Are you sure you want to delete the custom search engine "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
common.testSearchEngineDesc: A test search for "weather" will be performed using the {engine} search engine.
common.testSearchEngineNote: If the search page requires login or other actions, you can perform them in the test window. Please close the test window when you're done.
common.contentProtectionEnableDesc: Prevent screen sharing apps from capturing the DeepChat window to help protect your privacy. Not all apps honor this setting; in some environments a black window may remain.
common.contentProtectionDisableDesc: Allow screen sharing apps to capture the DeepChat window.
common.contentProtectionRestartNotice: Changing this setting will restart the application. Do you want to continue?
common.loggingEnableDesc: Enabling logging will help us diagnose issues and improve the application. Log files may contain sensitive information.
common.loggingDisableDesc: Disabling logging will stop collecting application logs.
common.webContentLengthLimitTooltip: Set the maximum length of text content extracted from web pages (character count), range: 0-50000. Setting to 0 means no limit and retrieves complete web content; higher values provide more complete web content but may increase processing time and token usage.
common.loggingRestartNotice: Changing this setting will restart the application. Do you want to continue?
common.notificationsDesc: When DeepChat is not in the foreground, if a session is generated, a system notification will be sent

data.title: Data Settings
data.importConfirmDescription: Importing will overwrite all current data, including chat history and settings. Make sure you have backed up important data. You'll need to restart the application after import.
data.resetConfirmDescription: Please select the type of data to reset. This operation cannot be undone and the application will restart automatically after reset.
data.resetChatDataDesc: Delete all chat history and conversation records
data.resetKnowledgeDataDesc: Delete all knowledge base files and vector data
data.resetConfigDesc: Delete all app settings, model configurations and custom prompts
data.resetAllDesc: Delete all data including chat history, configurations and cache files
data.resetCompleteDevMessage: Please manually restart the application in development mode. Stop the current process and run pnpm run dev again

systemPrompt.label: System Prompt
systemPrompt.description: Set the system prompt for the AI assistant to define its behavior and role

temperature.label: Model Temperature
temperature.description: Controls the randomness of the output; higher values produce more creative responses

contextLength.label: Context Length
contextLength.description: Set the maximum length of the conversation context

responseLength.label: Response Length
responseLength.description: Set the maximum length of the AI response

artifacts.description: Enabling the Artifacts feature allows the AI to generate richer content
artifacts.title: Artifacts

contextLength.description: Set the context length that the model can handle
contextLength.label: Context Length

modelConfig.description: Please note that this configuration is only valid for the current model and will not affect other models. Please modify it with caution. Incorrect parameters may cause the model to not work properly.

functionCall.description: Whether the model supports function calls natively (DeepChat will automatically simulate function calls after turning off this option)
functionCall.label: Function Calls

maxTokens.description: Set the maximum number of tokens for a single output of the model
maxTokens.label: Maximum output length

reasoning.description: Does the model support reasoning ability?
reasoning.label: Reasoning ability

enableSearch.label: Web Search
enableSearch.description: Enable the model to search the web for the latest information

forcedSearch.label: Forced Search
forcedSearch.description: Force the model to perform web search, when disabled the model decides automatically

searchStrategy.label: Search Strategy
searchStrategy.description: Choose search performance mode: turbo balances speed and effectiveness, max provides optimal search results

options.turbo: Turbo - Balance response speed and search effectiveness (Recommended)
options.max: Max - High performance mode, provides optimal search results

gemini.description: Limit the length of model thinking
gemini.onlySupported: Only supported in Gemini 2.5 Flash, 2.5 Pro, and 2.5 Flash-Lite
gemini.forceEnabled: Gemini 2.5 series models force enable thinking budget

warnings.proNoDisable: This model does not support disabling thinking, minimum value 128
warnings.proCannotDisable: Gemini 2.5 Pro cannot disable thinking function
warnings.flashLiteCannotSetZero: Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite cannot be set to 0, minimum value is 512
warnings.modelCannotDisable: This model cannot disable thinking function
warnings.flashLiteMinValue: Thinking budget cannot be less than 512 when set to specific value (or use 0 to disable thinking, -1 to enable dynamic thinking)
warnings.belowMin: Thinking budget cannot be less than {min}{hint}
warnings.aboveMax: Thinking budget cannot be greater than {max}

hints.withZeroAndDynamic: (or use 0 to disable thinking, -1 to enable dynamic thinking)

qwen3.description: Set the maximum token length for thinking process to control the depth of model reasoning

validation.minValue: Thinking budget value must be greater than or equal to 1

resetConfirm.message:
Are you sure you want to reset the configuration of this model to the default? 
This operation is irrevocable.
resetConfirm.title: Confirm reset

reasoningEffort.label: Reasoning Effort
reasoningEffort.description: Controls the depth of model reasoning; higher effort produces better results but slower responses

verbosity.label: Verbosity
verbosity.description: Controls the detail level and length of model responses

temperature.description: Control the randomness of the output. Most models are 0-1, and some support between 0-2. Higher values increase randomness.
temperature.label: Temperature

modelConfig.title: Custom model parameters

validation.contextLengthMin: The context length must be greater than 0
validation.contextLengthRequired: The context length cannot be empty
validation.maxTokensMax: The maximum output length cannot exceed 1000000
validation.maxTokensMin: The maximum output length must be greater than 0
validation.maxTokensRequired: The maximum output length cannot be empty
validation.temperatureMax: The temperature must be less than or equal to 2
validation.temperatureMin: The temperature must be greater than or equal to 0

vision.description: Does the model support visual ability?
vision.label: Visual ability

provider.deleteModelConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete model "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
provider.githubCopilotLoginTip: Authorize DeepChat to access your GitHub Copilot subscription. 'read:user' and 'read:org' permissions are required to access the Copilot API.

toast.modelRunningDesc: Please stop the model {model} first and then delete it.

mcpSync.title: Sync MCP Services
mcpSync.description: Sync MCP servers from ModelScope to local configuration, allowing quick addition of common MCP tools.
mcpSync.noApiKey: Please configure ModelScope API Key first
mcpSync.authenticationFailed: Authentication failed, please check API Key
mcpSync.fetchingServers: Getting the list of MCP servers...
mcpSync.serverAlreadyExists: The server already exists, skip import

modelscope.apiKeyHelper: Get your API Key in the ModelScope console
modelscope.description: ModelScope is a model-as-a-service sharing platform launched by Alibaba Damo Academy

details.operationalDescription: Synchronize MCP servers that can be used directly on the ModelScope platform
details.title: Provider settings details

modelscope.name: ModelScope

provider.anthropicApiKeyTip: Please go to Anthropic Console to get your API Key
provider.anthropicOAuthTip: Click to authorize DeepChat to access your Anthropic account
provider.anthropicOAuthFlowTip: The system will automatically open the authorization window. Please come back and enter the authorization code after authorization.
provider.anthropicCodeInstruction: Please complete the authorization in an external browser and paste the obtained authorization code into the input box below
provider.browserOpenedSuccess: The external browser is open, please complete the authorization
provider.oauthCodeHint: Please paste the authorization code here after completing the authorization in an external browser
provider.anthropicOAuthActiveTip: OAuth authentication is enabled, you can use Anthropic services directly
provider.bedrockLimitTip: * Only Anthropic Claude supported (including Opus, Sonnet, Haiku models)
provider.bedrockVerifyTip: DeepChat uses Claude 3.5 Sonnet for verification. If you do not have permission to invoke, the verification will fail. This will not affect the use of other models.

knowledgeBase.title: Knowledge Base Settings
knowledgeBase.selectKnowledgeBaseType: Please select the type of knowledge base to add
knowledgeBase.difyDescription: Dify knowledge base helps you manage and use document data
knowledgeBase.featureNotAvailable: This feature is not yet available
knowledgeBase.moreComingSoon: More knowledge base types coming soon
knowledgeBase.descriptionPlaceholder: Example: Company product documentation knowledge base
knowledgeBase.ragflowDescription: RAGFlow is a powerful knowledge base management system that supports multiple retrieval methods and document management features.
knowledgeBase.fastgptDescription: FastGPT is a powerful knowledge base management system that supports multiple retrieval methods and document management features.
knowledgeBase.builtInKnowledgeDescription: The built-in knowledge base provides some simple implementations that enable some basic functions in an offline environment.
knowledgeBase.editBuiltinKnowledgeConfig: Edit the built-in knowledge base configuration
knowledgeBase.chunkSizeHelper: Cut the document into segments, the size of each segment cannot exceed the model context limit
knowledgeBase.chunkOverlapHelper: The amount of content repeated between adjacent text blocks ensures that there is still a contextual connection between segmented text blocks, improving the overall effect of the model processing of long texts
knowledgeBase.modelNotFound: Service Provider {provider} or model {model} not found
knowledgeBase.modelNotFoundDesc:
Make sure the model is configured correctly and that the model is enabled. 
You can check the model configuration in the service provider settings.
knowledgeBase.removeBuiltinKnowledgeConfirmDesc: Deleting the built-in knowledge base configuration will delete all relevant data and cannot be restored. Please be cautious.
knowledgeBase.removeBuiltinKnowledgeConfirmTitle: Confirm to delete the built-in knowledge base {name}?
knowledgeBase.descriptionDesc: Description of the knowledge base so that the AI ​​decides whether to retrieve this knowledge base
knowledgeBase.autoDetectHelper: Automatically detect embedded dimensions, consumes a small amount of Tokens
knowledgeBase.chunkOverlapPlaceholder: Default value, no modification is recommended
knowledgeBase.chunkSizePlaceholder: Default value, no modification is recommended
knowledgeBase.selectEmbeddingModelHelper: Embedding models are prohibited after creation of knowledge base
knowledgeBase.dimensionsHelper: Make sure the model supports the set embed dimension size
knowledgeBase.fragmentsNumberHelper: The more fragments of requested document, the more information it comes with, but the more tokens it needs to be consumed
knowledgeBase.uploadHelper: Click to upload or drag the file here
knowledgeBase.normalizedHelper: Please confirm that the model supports L2 normalization of output vectors

beforequit.title: Exit confirmation
beforequit.description:
There is a running knowledge base task. Are you sure to exit the software? 
Aborted tasks can be restored after restarting the software.

reAddFile.title: Re-upload confirmation
reAddFile.content: Are you sure to re-upload the file "{fileName}"?

deleteFile.title: Delete file confirmation
deleteFile.content:
Are you sure to delete the file "{fileName}"? 
This operation is not restored.

knowledgeBase.separatorsHelper: Document segmentation delimiter, a single delimiter is enclosed in double quotes (""), and delimiters are separated by commas (,)

npmRegistry.title: NPM Registry Configuration
npmRegistry.advancedSettingsDesc: Configure advanced NPM registry options, including auto-detection and custom source settings
npmRegistry.autoDetectDesc: Automatically detect and use the fastest NPM registry on startup
npmRegistry.refreshSuccessDesc: Re-detected and updated optimal NPM registry
npmRegistry.autoDetectDisabled: Auto-detect disabled, will use default registry
npmRegistry.customSourceClearedDesc: Custom NPM registry cleared, will use auto-detect

npmRegistry.redetectCompleteDesc: Detected and set the current optimal NPM registry

display.floatingButtonDesc: Display a floating button on the desktop to quickly activate the application window

shortcuts.pressEnterToSave: Press Enter to save, Esc to cancel
shortcuts.noModifierOnly: Cannot use modifier key alone as shortcut
shortcuts.keyConflict: Shortcut key conflict, please choose another combination

rateLimit.description: Control request interval to prevent exceeding API limits
rateLimit.intervalHelper: Minimum interval between requests, disable rate limiting if not needed
rateLimit.confirmDisableMessage: Value cannot be less than or equal to 0. Do you want to disable rate limiting?

promptSetting.resetToDefaultSuccess: Reset to default system prompt successfully
promptSetting.resetToDefaultFailed: Failed to reset, please try again
